query:
SELECT up.topicId, up.status, up.score, t.title,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM question_progress qp WHERE qp.userId = 7 AND qp.topicId = up.topicId) as answered_questions,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM questions q WHERE q.topicId = up.topicId) as total_questions
FROM user_progress up
JOIN topics t ON up.topicId = t.id
WHERE up.userId = 7 AND up.courseId = 30002
ORDER BY up.topicId;

JOIN topics t ON up.topicId = t.id
